company.name: Razorpay
company.tagline: Payments and financial infrastructure for Indian businesses
company.one_liner: Razorpay enables businesses in India to accept, process, and disburse payments across multiple payment modes.

pricing.price_summary: Pricing starts at ~2% per transaction (platform fee); GST is applicable on fees. No setup or maintenance fees for standard gateway.
pricing.notes: Enterprise/custom plans available on request; exact rates may vary by use case and vertical.

pricing.price_summary: Products like RazorpayX (payouts, payroll) and Subscription billing have separate pricing; check product pages.
pricing.notes: Offers and waivers (e.g., limited no-fee transactions) may apply for new merchants per terms.

faq.question: What does Razorpay do?
faq.answer: Razorpay provides a payments platform that lets businesses accept, process and disburse payments. Its product suite includes Payment Gateway, Payment Pages, Subscriptions, and RazorpayX for payouts and business banking. (Source: Razorpay product docs)

faq.question: Do you have a free tier?
faq.answer: Razorpay’s standard payment gateway does not charge setup or monthly maintenance fees; charges are applied per-transaction (platform fee) and GST applies. Enterprise plans are custom-priced. Check Razorpay’s pricing page for current details. (Source: Razorpay pricing)

faq.question: Who is Razorpay for?
faq.answer: Razorpay targets e-commerce merchants, SaaS businesses, marketplaces, and developers who need payment APIs, hosted checkout, subscriptions and payout capabilities in India. It also supports freelancers and individual business entities. (Source: Razorpay docs / FAQs)

faq.question: What payment methods do you support?
faq.answer: Razorpay supports UPI, credit and debit cards (Visa/Mastercard/RuPay/etc.), netbanking and popular wallets and other local payment methods. (Source: Razorpay docs)

faq.question: How long does settlement take?
faq.answer: Settlement is typically processed with a T+2 business day payout window for domestic transactions, though the settlement cycle can vary by bank, vertical and onboarding/risk checks. (Source: Razorpay settlements docs)

faq.question: How quickly can I integrate and start accepting payments?
faq.answer: Razorpay provides APIs and SDKs for web and mobile to integrate payment methods quickly. For enterprise onboarding, activation timelines vary; many standard merchants can start accepting payments after onboarding and KYC. (Source: Razorpay docs)
